file_content.text: Stop! We give up! No more blasting! You win! You better hunter! We leave Big Hunt!
Well, that was easy.
Go on then.
Not fair! Not fair! Mark Two war droid not complete! We shamed! We go now!
It's easier and cleaner if I prove you're dead.
Why shouldn't I kill you?
Aw, come on. Look at them. They're so cute! Couldn't we just let them go?
No please! We go tell Big Hunt assistant how bad you beat us, tell all hunters, maybe others give up too?
You just bought your lives.
Good enough.
Time to seek new blood profession! Come, brothers!
I prefer blasting Ugnaughts.
Nah. [Kill Ugnaughts]
Too late, little pigs.
No, you die. [Kill Ugnaughts]
Stop! We give up! No more blasting! Our big fight not with you!
You're the target, all right.
I beg to differ.
Too late to make nice now.
Should have been friendlier.
Who you? Why you seek trouble? Why you come here?
Can't you little fellas guess by now?
Do I have to spell it out?
Me big hunter! On Big Hunt!
You understand "rival"?
You Big Hunt rival! You better hunter! We leave Big Hunt! You win!
Guess your war droid didn't help much, huh?
Better luck next time.
Yep, I win and you die.
You're done, all right. [Kill]
To kill all of you, why else?
For blood. [Kill Ugnaughts]
Guess again, little pigs.
Whatever. [Kill Ugnaughts]
Honor! Glory for Clan Zargnor!
No! Not there! You blind? Cannons too close to generator! Want another big boom? Put cannons over--
Hey! Who you? How you get here?
I'm a bounty hunter on the Great Hunt.
Your competition.
What are you little fellas building?
Tell me about your project.
Nothing! You see nothing! Not your business! Go away!
Hey, this isn't Gort's Casino!
Oops, I'm lost!
No this not! This important work! Go away now!
This your only warning!
Are you building a war droid?
That looks like a droid.
No! We build "ultimate" war droid! Pack big boom! This Mark Two!
Will this one blow up like before?
Didn't the other one fail?
No! Mark Two better! Mark One had big problem! Cannons too--wait! How you know Mark One blow up? Only hunters on Big Hunt--
What happened to Mark One?
Mark Two?
We not talk about Mark One! It hunter business only! We tough bounty hunters!
Looks like a piece of junk.
Doesn't look impressive.
Mark Two not junk! It give big boom! You got big mouth! We tired of big mouth!
Are you threatening me, little one?
That sounds hostile.
Yes! Big threat! You not want to mess with us! We tough bounty hunters!
Bounty hunters? Really?
Small world.
We big bounty hunters! We on Big Hunt! Only tough hunters do Big Hunt!
What a coincidence. I'm on the "Big Hunt" too.
Hunters like me.
Wait! If you on Big Hunt, that mean you--
It's the Great Hunt, not the Big Hunt.
It's not called "Big Hunt."
How you know? No one know about Big--
Oh no! You rival! Rival has found us! Must kill rival!
My feelings exactly.
Finally. [Attack]
Your droid isn't even done. Don't make me kill you.
You can't win.
What? But we big bounty....
He right. We work too hard! You quit Big Hunt!
No, big hunter right. Mark Two not finished. You get drop on us. You big hunter!
You win! We leave Big Hunt! You kill Shadow Death! We think you not do it!
It's over. [Attack]
Blast big rival! Now!
That's all I needed to know.
Just had to be sure. [Attack]
That's a lot of equipment for one bounty.
Who's the mark?
We after big assassin! He Shadow Death! Kill everyone! But we get him!
Big plan not finished yet. But we give Shadow Death big boom! Mark Two war droid blast him to sludge!
But now you know too much! You might warn Shadow Death! Maybe you be Shadow Death! You die now!
Oh, I bet. Big scary bounty hunters.
You're insane.
You got big mouth! We tired of big mouth! We warned you! Now you die!
I don't like being ordered around.
This is silly. [Attack]
Blast big dumb one!
We better be talking a really big boom.
Is it really good?
Big boom weapon in lockbox. On table. Here is code.
Okay, okay. Stop squealing.
